subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Remapping Jerome
msgSnippet: On 3/23/2002 at 6:47 PM Ewout Stam wrote: I know of a few programs which create fonts. This is a very complicated process (That s how I find it). Look on the
messageBody:
On 3/23/2002 at 6:47 PM Ewout Stam wrote:
I know of a few programs which create fonts. This is a very complicated process (That's how I find it). Look on the web for Softy. An old program which is relatively cheap.

I also know of Macromedia Fontographer, which is very expensive, but used by most commercial organisations.

Try "Font Creator Program" for Windows, at www.high-logic.com -- It's shareware, works for a few weeks, and the registration fee is very reasonable-- US$25!

 

It's better than Softy- I've tried both, believe me..

 

D.M.Falk
